title: Nice raise. Too bad about inflation.
description:
Higher prices mean your boss may need to give you more than just a small raise. Recode’s Rani Molla explains.
Read Rani’s story: https://www.vox.com/recode/22933594/pay-raise-price-inflation-employers-great-resignation
Today’s episode was produced by Taylor Maycan, engineered by Melissa Pons (Hemlock Creek Productions) and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
Support Recode Daily by making a financial contribution to Vox! bit.ly/givepodcasts
